title: EntityActionGuard
contents:
mode_edit code
API > @ngrx/data

EntityActionGuardlink

Guard methods that ensure EntityAction payload is as expected. Each method returns that payload if it passes the guard or throws an error.

class EntityActionGuard<T> { constructor(entityName: string, selectId: IdSelector<T>) mustBeEntity(action: EntityAction<T>): T mustBeEntities(action: EntityAction<T[]>): T[] mustBeKey(action: EntityAction<string | number>): string | number | never mustBeKeys(action: EntityAction<(string | number)[]>): (string | number)[] mustBeUpdate(action: EntityAction<Update<T>>): Update<T> mustBeUpdates(action: EntityAction<Update<T>[]>): Update<T>[] mustBeUpdateResponse(action: EntityAction<UpdateResponseData<T>>): UpdateResponseData<T> mustBeUpdateResponses(action: EntityAction<UpdateResponseData<T>[]>): UpdateResponseData<T>[] }

Constructorlink

constructor(entityName: string, selectId: IdSelector<T>)

Parameters

entityName string
selectId IdSelector<T>

Methodslink

mustBeEntity() link

mode_edit code

Throw if the action payload is not an entity with a valid key
mustBeEntity(action: EntityAction<T>): T

Parameters

action EntityAction<T>

Returns

T

mustBeEntities() link

mode_edit code

Throw if the action payload is not an array of entities with valid keys
mustBeEntities(action: EntityAction<T[]>): T[]

Parameters

action EntityAction<T[]>

Returns

T[]

mustBeKey() link

mode_edit code

Throw if the action payload is not a single, valid key

Parameters

action EntityAction<string | number>

Returns

string | number | never
